person.persName: Sandusky Bruton (Barren County 1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Born in February 1839. Married to Margaret Bruton. Children included Alice. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment in August 1861. Promoted from 1st Sergeant to 2nd Lieutenant, June 30, 1864.

bibl.p: Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, (ED) 16, sheet 21B, family 412, NARA microfilm publication T623 (Washington, D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 1972.); FHL microfilm 1,240,507; Sergeant E.
